item.title: 荷兰国际集团称，逃离人工智能动荡的投资者或转向欧元债券
item.description: 荷兰国际集团表示，对于寻求避开因人工智能发展引发的美国股市波动的投资者而言，欧洲政府债券可能具有吸引力。【原文：European government bonds could prove attractive to investors seeking shelter from swings in US stocks caused by artificial intelligence developments, according to ING Groep NV.】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险宣布回购价值高达22.5亿欧元的股份
item.description: 德国再保险公司慕尼黑再保险宣布计划通过一项新的回购计划向股东返还高达22.5亿欧元（27亿美元）的资金。【原文：German reinsurer Munich Re announced plans to return as much as €2.25 billion ($2.7 billion) to shareholders through a new buyback program.】

item.title: 西特里尼的反乌托邦式人工智能愿景引发全球投资者批评
item.description: 西特里尼研究公司关于人工智能将引发大规模失业的观点，正引发全球投资者和经济学家的强烈反对。【原文：The idea from Citrini Research that artificial intelligence will trigger widespread unemployment is prompting a global backlash from investors and economists.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：Cava、Circle Internet、劳氏、奇趣科技
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:45，标普500指数期货上涨0.3%，交易员正关注英伟达将于盘后公布的财报。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures rise 0.3% as of 7:45 a.m. in New York as traders look ahead to Nvidia’s earnings, due after the market close.】

item.title: 西班牙旅游圣地贝尼多姆竭力避免破产
item.description: 欧洲最著名的海滨度假胜地之一正竭力避免破产，此前因一桩失败的房地产交易被判赔付3.5亿欧元（约合4.12亿美元）。【原文：One of Europe’s most famous beach resorts is scrambling to avoid insolvency after it was ordered to pay €350 million ($412 million) in compensation over a real estate deal gone awry.】

item.title: 欧佩克+代表预计该组织将恢复适度增产
item.description: 一些欧佩克+代表表示，他们预计该组织将在本周末召开会议审议四月政策时，同意恢复适度增产。【原文：Some OPEC+ delegates said they expect the group will agree to resume modest production increases when it meets this weekend to review policy for April.】

item.title: 基石XL输油管道项目复活或将重燃争议
item.description: 政治风向再度转变，对这个失败的项目有利。【原文：Political winds have shifted again in favor of the failed project.】

item.title: 南非年度预算要点：债务峰值与税收减免
item.description: 南非国家财政部表示，公共债务占国内生产总值的比例将在今年达到峰值。该部同时宣布税收收入超出预期，并将为纳税人提供减免以支持经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury said public debt as a percentage of gross domestic product will peak this year, as it announced better-than-expected revenue collection and relief for taxpayers to support economic growth.】

item.title: 南非预算标志着债务达到峰值的转折点
item.description: 南非债务在经历近二十年的增长后，将于本财年达到峰值。这一转折点为通过减税和基础设施投资支持经济创造了空间。【原文：South Africa’s debt will peak this fiscal year after rising for nearly two decades, a turning point that creates space to support the economy through tax relief and infrastructure investment.】

item.title: 南非拟定债务上限规则以维持财政纪律
item.description: 南非将于今年晚些时候提出具有约束力的指导方针，通过引入基于原则的财政锚定机制而非数字化规则，确保公共财政保持可持续路径。【原文：South Africa will propose binding guidelines later this year to keep public finances on a sustainable path by introducing a principle-based fiscal anchor rather than numerical rules.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称，人工智能恐慌对选股者而言是机遇
item.description: 摩根士丹利策略师指出，因担忧人工智能颠覆性影响而引发的跨板块过度抛售，为个股精选者创造了机遇。【原文：Excessive selloffs across sectors triggered by fears of artificial intelligence disruption create opportunities for stock pickers, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 韩国记忆制造商以HBF理念寻求下一次突破
item.description: 高带宽闪存让内存芯片制造商的整个行业都沸腾了【原文：High-bandwidth flash has everyone in the home of memory chipmakers buzzing】

item.title: 默茨在北京直面德国地位下滑
item.description: 德国财政部长弗里德里希·默茨访华期间正面临德国经济地位下滑的局面。【原文：Chancellor Friedrich Merz is confronting Germany’s diminished economic status as he visits Beijing.】

item.title: 1120亿美元的差距使评估中美脱钩变得困难
item.description: 空壳公司提供大幅航运折扣，在海关申报单上低报货物价值，随后便消失得无影无踪。【原文：Shell companies offer deep shipping discounts, undervalue cargo on customs forms and then disappearing overnight】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率降至2022年以来最低水平，推动再融资需求上升
item.description: 上周美国抵押贷款利率下滑至2022年以来的最低水平，从而带动了更多再融资活动。【原文：US mortgage rates slipped last week to the lowest level since 2022, generating more refinancing activity.】

item.title: Circle股价飙升，因其利润和营收超出预期
item.description: Circle互联网集团的利润和收入增幅超出预期，其USDC稳定币流通量在第四季度激增72%，达到753亿美元。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc.’s profit and revenue increased more than estimated while the amount of its USDC stablecoin in circulation jumped 72% to $75.3 billion in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 国家银行业绩超预期，加之加粮局推动主要业务线发展
item.description: 加拿大国家银行在财年第一季度业绩全面向好，超出分析师预期，这得益于该行收购加拿大西部银行带来的推动作用。【原文：National Bank of Canada beat analyst estimates in its fiscal first quarter after it reported stronger results across the board, boosted by the bank’s purchase of Canadian Western Bank.】

item.title: 泰铢升值或将冲击泰国40亿美元大米出口
item.description: 泰国大米出口量预计将跌至五年低点，行业组织称，本国货币升值削弱了该国的竞争力，威胁到这个雇佣了四分之一劳动力的行业的收入。【原文：Thailand’s rice exports are set to drop to a five-year low as a surge in the local currency dents the country’s competitiveness, according to a trade group, threatening incomes in a sector that employs one in four workers.】

item.title: 科特迪瓦可可销售重启，监管机构取消溢价政策
item.description: 在当地监管机构同意将可可售价与全球价格持平后，部分贸易商已重启从最大生产国科特迪瓦采购可可的业务。此举扭转了此前导致买家僵持、致使数十万吨可可滞销的政策。【原文：Some traders have resumed buying cocoa from top grower Ivory Coast after the local regulator agreed to sell at par with global prices, a shift from a policy that led to a standoff with buyers and left hundreds of thousands of tons unsold.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚批准预算改革后进军外债市场
item.description: 罗马尼亚今年首次在国际市场发售债券，借势政府推进削减预算赤字所需改革后市场情绪的改善。【原文：Romania is selling bonds on international markets for the first time this year to capitalize on improved sentiment after the government pushed through reforms needed to reduce the budget deficit.】

item.title: 欧洲央行不应因通胀胜利而自满，武伊奇表示
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员博里斯·武伊奇奇表示，尽管官员们已重新掌控物价，但欧洲央行仍需对潜在风险保持警惕。【原文：The European Central Bank must remain alert to dangers despite officials having wrested back control over prices, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 持有亏损比特币的投资者在每次反弹时都在抛售
item.description:
目前流通中的比特币中，约有45%的市值低于持有者当初的购买成本。

【原文：

About 45% of all of Bitcoin in circulation are currently valued at below what the owner paid.

item.title: 台达电子受惠于人工智能基础设施需求激增，利润创历史新高
item.description: 台达电子公司盈利创下历史新高，主要得益于人工智能数据中心对高端电力系统和液冷解决方案的强劲需求。【原文：Delta Electronics Inc. earnings rose to a record, propelled by robust demand for high-end power systems and liquid cooling solutions used in data centers for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Temenos股价飙升，因软件公司上调业绩目标并淡化人工智能担忧
item.description: 特美诺股价上涨，此前这家软件公司上调中期业绩指引，缓解了市场对人工智能对该行业影响的担忧。【原文：Temenos shares gained after the software company lifted its mid-term guidance, pushing back on worries over the impact of artificial intelligence on the sector.】

item.title: 澳大利亚储备银行行长布洛克表示，目前对经济形势作出判断颇具难度
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔·布洛克表示，与此前加息时期相比，当前判断经济形势"略显困难"，这进一步强化了其审慎的政策立场。【原文：Australia’s central bank Governor Michele Bullock said judging the economy is “a little bit more difficult” now than in previous periods when it was raising interest rates, reinforcing her cautious policy stance.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴以低成本方式深化人工智能编程工具布局
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司——这家已跃居人工智能领域领先地位的中国电商巨头，正加速推进软件编码工具的布局，为用户提供低成本接入中国多款顶尖人工智能模型的通道。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., the Chinese e-commerce player that has become a leader in artificial intelligence, is stepping up a push into software coding tools, offering low-cost access to several of the country’s top AI models.】

item.title: 美国国债本周跌幅或创纪录，因风险偏好骤升
item.description: 随着科技股上涨，投资者撤离避险资产，国债价格下跌，美元走软。【原文：Treasuries fell and the dollar slipped as investors exited haven assets following advances in tech stocks.】

item.title: 中国警告美国：若贸易调查引发新关税，中方将予以回应
item.description: 中国警告称，若美国以对2020年贸易协议的调查为由加征新关税，中方将采取"一切必要措施"。此前华盛顿方面已表示将继续推进该项调查。【原文：China warned it will take “all necessary measures” if the US uses a probe into a 2020 trade deal to impose fresh tariffs, after Washington signaled the investigation would continue.】

item.title: 新兴市场涨势渐起，韩国股市排名超越法国
item.description: 新兴市场股票和货币周三攀升至历史新高，亚洲科技股的最新涨势推动韩国股市跃居全球第九大股市，超越法国和德国。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies climbed to fresh records on Wednesday, with the latest Asian tech gains lifting South Korea’s bourse to the world’s ninth largest, topping both France and Germany.】

item.title: 强劲财报难抵人工智能与信贷忧虑，拖累股市表现
item.description: 美国企业刚刚交出了近年来最亮眼的财报季成绩单，但股市表现却完全看不出这一点。【原文：Corporate America just delivered one of the strongest earnings seasons in recent memory, but you wouldn’t know it looking at the stock market.】
